name: CapsuleLand
description:
(BEFORE PLAYING:)

This game is indie, and also the game is in beta phase, it has errors and bugs. So you can play it and say what the game needs. And for more updates. Please donate to me so I can continue. Thanks.

CapsuleLand It is a multiplayer game in which on a map being a capsule you can shoot in the first person and compete with others. It is in beta phase and my first game created.
